targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Physical Cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance =~ /^${Instance:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "% Core Util Time")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 50ms, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Physical Cpu")
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance =~ /${Instance:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "% Core Util Time")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 50ms, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 100.0)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Vcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Physical Cpu")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => string(v: int(v: r._value)) =~ /^${Instance:regex}$/)   // ✅ here
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

instSet =
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Vcpu")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Physical Cpu")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"]) // your logic
    |> filter(fn: (r) => string(v: int(v: r._value)) =~ /^${Instance:regex}$/)
    |> keep(columns: ["instance"])
    |> distinct(column: "instance")
    |> group() // ✅ merge all instance tables into one
    |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "instance")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Vcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "% Run")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.instance, set: instSet))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

instSet =
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Vcpu")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Physical Cpu")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"]) // your logic
    |> filter(fn: (r) => string(v: int(v: r._value)) =~ /^${Instance:regex}$/)
    |> keep(columns: ["instance"])
    |> distinct(column: "instance")
    |> group() // ✅ merge all instance tables into one
    |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "instance")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Vcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "% Used")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.instance, set: instSet))

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Vcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance =~ /vmx-vcpu-[0-63]+:UPI_RB_NRDB0/)	
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Physical Cpu")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "instance"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 200ms, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "esxtop")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Physical Cpu")
  |> group(columns: ["instance"])
  |> distinct(column: "instance")
  |> yield()
list.name: Instance

query.query:
from(bucket: "esxtop")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /${Host:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.group == "Physical Cpu")
  |> group(columns: ["instance"])
  |> distinct(column: "instance")
  |> yield()
